languages.text: Shots from this weapon don’t count towards the attack limit if the wielder fired from {g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}The Rack{/g} this turn.

traits.locale_text: Shots from this weapon don’t count towards the attack limit if the wielder fired from {g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}The Rack{/g} this turn.

languages.text: The wielder can make a free attack with this weapon if they shot from {g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}the Rack{/g} on the same {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Персонаж может выстрелить из Безысходности вне лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, если в этом ходу он стрелял из {g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}Тлена{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The wielder can make a free attack from this weapon, if they shot from {g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}the Rack{/g} on the same turn.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, aynı {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} {g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}Yıkan{/g} ile atış yaptıysa bu silahla da serbest bir saldırı yapabilir.

languages.text: El portador puede efectuar un ataque gratuito con esta arma si ha disparado con {g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}el Tormento{/g} en el mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wielder can make a free attack with this weapon if they shot from {g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}the Rack{/g} on the same {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 如果装备者在同一{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内使用{g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}痛苦{/g}射击过，则可以用这把武器进行一次无消耗的射击。
